title: "generate_more_data.Rmd"
output: html_document
date: "2023-04-03"
---


```{r}
d <- read_csv('df_between.csv')
```


```{r}
more_data <-
 d %>% 
  # mutate(sd = c(rnorm(10, 5, 1),  rnorm(10, 5.5, 1),  rnorm(10, 5, 1))) %>% 
  mutate(sd = rep(c(5, 7, 9))) %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(draw_wpm = list(rnorm(100, mean = wpm, sd = sd))) %>% 
  unnest(draw_wpm)
```
`


```{r fig.height=10, fig.width=5}
more_data %>% 
  ggplot() +
  stat_slab(aes(x = draw_wpm, y = user_id))
```


```{r}
write_csv(more_data, 'df_between_more.csv')
```
